payload.description: Enhance ImageBlock.jsx lightbox with mobile gestures: swipe left/right for navigation using framer-motion drag, swipe down to close (150px threshold), pinch-to-zoom support, double-tap to toggle zoom. Use motion.div for image container with drag constraints.
payload.context: Import motion from framer-motion. Add drag='x' for horizontal swipe navigation, onDragEnd to check offset and change image. Add drag='y' for close gesture with dragConstraints. Pinch zoom using transform: scale. Double-tap using onTapStart counter. Maintain existing lightbox functionality.
